original: HAMMARLUND, Paul, Trävaruhandlare, Målen, f Eksjö 7/10 92. Anst trävaruaff 11— 16. Inneh fma Paul Hammarlund, byggn.mtrl, Målen, sed. 16. Fd komm.flm; led valnmd, barnav.nmd, elstyr o dir f Båstads, Grevie o Förslövs fattigv.frb, i ktén f Städern allm brandstodsbol; huvm o rev Båstads sparbk, siffergransk Båstadsortens kreditfrn. Intress nykterh.man.
translated: HAMMARLUND, Paul, Timber Dealer, Målen, born in Eksjö on October 7th, 1892. Employed at a timber trade business from 1911-1916. Became the owner of Paul Hammarlund Building Materials, Målen, since 1916. Former municipal commissioner; member of the election committee, child welfare committee, electricity control and management board of Båstads, Grevie and Förslövs Poor Relief Association, in the committee of the Municipal Fire Insurance Company. Chairman and director of Båstad Savings Bank, auditor of Båstad District Credit Union. Interest in temperance movements.

memberOfCommission.name: Båstads, Grevie and Förslövs Poor Relief Association

career.occupational_title: Owner of Paul Hammarlund Building Materials
